DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity of the 13-valent pneumococcal vaccine (13vPnC) compare to the 7-valent pneumococcal vaccine (7vPnC) and to compare the immune response to concomitant vaccines administered with 13vPnC and 7vPnC.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine With 7-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Healthy 2monthold infants. Available for the entire study period. Exclusion criteria: Previous vaccination with any vaccine before the start of the study. Known contraindication to vaccination.
